title: seek3r
author: seek3r
content: To all the Squirrelbits-Lovers,there will be a Squirrelbits auction @ Scarce.city in a few hours! First Squirrelbits item which is facing this platform!!!Only reason I am selling this piece of art is because I now own it in multiple times. I bought it at the beginning of the year from Est2013 here in the forum. (Can provide the link)Here are the details:ITEM: Hodl til Death Slab SERIAL: 13/21 FUNDING: Yes! 4444 bits (0.004444 BTC)AUCTION: https://scarce.city/auctions/squirrelbits-hold-til-death If there are questions about item or how to bid, feel free to ask.  Happy bidding everyone.

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: One of my favorite Squirrel Slabs!  GL with the sale... hope it goes big!!

comments.author: pinky1234
comments.body: fIRST time , squirrel bit on scarse.  I might put an auction in 2026    .. GOOD luck to all .May-2023-gettyup-SS piece w/oak case

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Extremely sexy squirrel bit piece, looking at these close-up photos might rate it among my top5s from Liquid.Hope I find the time to register an account with scarcecity soon.Good luck with your auction!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I just noticed - is the typo intentional on that piece?

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 18, 2023, 06:03:55 PMI just noticed - is the typo intentional on that piece?Haha, I never noticed this. It's actually cold Hold not HODL?! What is going on.     Thanks for pointing it out - how did you even see this?Is hold even still a word that exists in the dictionary in 2023?  trolol

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on July 18, 2023, 06:08:51 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 18, 2023, 06:03:55 PMI just noticed - is the typo intentional on that piece?Haha, I never noticed this. It's actually cold Hold not HODL?! What is going on.     Thanks for pointing it out - how did you even see this?Is hold even still a word that exists in the dictionary in 2023?  trololI assume that the prolly intentional -slang- spelling mistake is the "psychopaths" part...

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: tweetious on July 18, 2023, 06:15:41 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on July 18, 2023, 06:08:51 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 18, 2023, 06:03:55 PMI just noticed - is the typo intentional on that piece?Haha, I never noticed this. It's actually called Hold not HODL?! What is going on.     Thanks for pointing it out - how did you even see this?Is hold even still a word that exists in the dictionary in 2023?  trololI assume that the prolly intentional -slang- spelling mistake is the "psychopaths" part...I feel bad for derailing seek3rs thread a little. But indeed there is a s missing. Didn't even notice, quite hard to spot unless you know about it. Still, I find it even more strange to write HOLD instead of HODL.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: It was always called "Hold til death". That wasn't a mistake but I can't believe I just noticed psychopaths was misspelled lolJune-2022-Hold Til Death-21 Slabs (Ti 2.06" x 4.6") gold11816cff2bfb93556073cd4dabc4761dcae4c13857dc30ea105402ba27343030

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on July 18, 2023, 06:28:25 PMI feel bad for derailing seek3rs thread a little. But indeed there is a s missing. Didn't even notice, quite hard to spot unless you know about it. Still, I find it even more strange to write HOLD instead of HODL. You dont have to!  This was new to me aswell.Btw.. the auction has started! Place your betsssssssssssssss!

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Around 22 hours left for this auction.Current winning bid is 0.009 BTCShipping is from the US! (via minerjones)

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: Humble Bitcoiners on July 20, 2023, 05:15:16 PMSoooo hot🔥Squirrels coolest piece imoAnd an absolute steal for the current price of 0.011 btc!Auction ends in less than 2 hours.Please keep in mind that you have to deposit the amount you are bidding! Otherwise you will miss the chance there.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Nice looking slab and it looks like it went for a healthy sum of Satoshi as well!  Congratulations to PeakDk! Nice win there and a fine piece of Squirrelbits slab to add to any collection!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Congrats to the winner. My first time trying scarce.city. Easy experience. Need to look into it more, though - is it like an exchange holding my funds or do they have a decentralized system behind it etc.Also, what I don't like - there is no "verify bid" pop-up before submitting your bid, seems easy to make a mistake by adding one digit too much.Anyway, GG PeakDk.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on July 20, 2023, 11:27:17 PMCongrats to the winner. My first time trying scarce.city. Easy experience. Need to look into it more, though - is it like an exchange holding my funds or do they have a decentralized system behind it etc.Also, what I don't like - there is no "verify bid" pop-up before submitting your bid, seems easy to make a mistake by adding one digit too much.Anyway, GG PeakDk.Yes, congrats to PeakDK for winning the awesome Squirrelbits slab I am not exactly sure how Scarce City handles their bids/deposits, but I do know they use LN for a lot of it, so would imagine they have some kind of open LN channel with a decent amount of capacity.Maybe something to add for a future update/upgrade to their user experience on their platform... I know they are always open to improvement/comments to further the experience They do have a Telegram group that is open to join: https://t.me/+Y8cTAoHurtowODhh

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on July 21, 2023, 12:54:00 AMQuote from: Kryptowerk on July 20, 2023, 11:27:17 PMCongrats to the winner. My first time trying scarce.city. Easy experience. Need to look into it more, though - is it like an exchange holding my funds or do they have a decentralized system behind it etc.Also, what I don't like - there is no "verify bid" pop-up before submitting your bid, seems easy to make a mistake by adding one digit too much.Anyway, GG PeakDk.Yes, congrats to PeakDK for winning the awesome Squirrelbits slab I am not exactly sure how Scarce City handles their bids/deposits, but I do know they use LN for a lot of it, so would imagine they have some kind of open LN channel with a decent amount of capacity.Maybe something to add for a future update/upgrade to their user experience on their platform... I know they are always open to improvement/comments to further the experience They do have a Telegram group that is open to join: https://t.me/+Y8cTAoHurtowODhhYou can deposit 1 million sats on-chain without lightning and have access to unlimited bids for most of their auctions

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: nice sale! and deposits? I have never had to make a deposit there when bidding.

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on July 21, 2023, 12:54:00 AMQuote from: Kryptowerk on July 20, 2023, 11:27:17 PMCongrats to the winner. My first time trying scarce.city. Easy experience. Need to look into it more, though - is it like an exchange holding my funds or do they have a decentralized system behind it etc.Also, what I don't like - there is no "verify bid" pop-up before submitting your bid, seems easy to make a mistake by adding one digit too much.Anyway, GG PeakDk.Yes, congrats to PeakDK for winning the awesome Squirrelbits slab I am not exactly sure how Scarce City handles their bids/deposits, but I do know they use LN for a lot of it, so would imagine they have some kind of open LN channel with a decent amount of capacity.Maybe something to add for a future update/upgrade to their user experience on their platform... I know they are always open to improvement/comments to further the experience They do have a Telegram group that is open to join: https://t.me/+Y8cTAoHurtowODhhKeep an eye out in your e mail, in the past it took a few days then they will e mail you the funds, you can download “wallet of satoshi” to redeem on the lightning network to send wherever you want.You elected for unlimited bidding so you deposited the funds… This is my understanding and what happens to me the first time.

comments.author: BTCOVERFIATS
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on July 21, 2023, 03:15:44 AMnice sale! and deposits? I have never had to make a deposit there when bidding. Are you sure about that? Even with an account you can't bid without depositing a small percentage of your bid
